programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Big Farm Fair - Welcome to the Great Farm Fair! There's food, games and even a Piggie talent show! When Rainbow Puppy's piglet Twinkle goes missing at the fair, Josh plays Blue's Clues to find Twinkle and keep her and Rainbow Puppy's blue-ribbon dreams alive.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save A Chili Cook-Out - Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep217
programme.desc: The Secret Room - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep415
programme.desc: The Flying Lion - Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Royal Rescue - A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave. // With the farmers out of town, Mayor Goodway calls the PAW Patrol to wrangle the animals and control the chaos on the farmerless farm

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep410
programme.desc: Pearl's Kickball Championship - It's the Neighborhood Kickball Championship! Pearl, the neighborhood's best kicker, has albinism and nystagmus, and so the teams use a Beep Kickball to play. When the ball deflates, Josh plays Blue's Clues to figure out how to save the kickball game!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep418
programme.desc: Blaze and the Magic Genie - Blaze and AJ are driving through the desert when they meet a magical Genie who loves to grant wishes! But when the Genie loses the jewels that give him his powers, Blaze and AJ go on a quest to get them back!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep411
programme.desc: The Case of the Missing Thinking Chair - The Thinking Chair is MISSING! This is a mystery so huge that Josh and Blue need to call in the Blueprints Detective Agency for Steve's help. Working together, will they be able to figure out this big mystery?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Deep Dive / Firefruit Surprise - When Lola and Jade think they see mermaids in Sparkle Sea, Jade uses a Glow Crystal trying find them and disturbs the deep-sea fishes below. // Steel convinces Bobbi to harvest a fire-fruit on Sparkle Island but they set off a volcano unexpectedly!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save the Cat Show - Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch! // When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Little Shrimp, Big Problems - The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep420
programme.desc: The Midnight Mile - It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer / Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - Mayor Goodway tries to help the PAW Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too! // A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Deep Goo Sea - William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep412
programme.desc: The Big Blue Derby - Start your engines, because the Big Blue Derby is about to begin! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can make Slippery's racecar go super-fast in the race as he goes head-to-head with Blue, Rainbow Puppy and his cousin Slick!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles / Santiago's Regatta - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep111
programme.desc: New New Year / Finders Keepers / Busy Buddies - Bossy is worried his family does not celebrate the Korean New Year "the right way. // Bossy finds a cool toy but doesn't want to give it up. // Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save Election Day / Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: World's Ultimate Frontier
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.
